name: Museu do Amanhã
description: A science museum in Rio de Janeiro focused on sustainability and innovation. Features interactive exhibits and a waterfront location.

name: Catedral Metropolitana de Florianopolis
description: 1908 Catholic church with twin towers, stained-glass windows, frescoes & statuary.

name: Museu de Arte de São Paulo Assis Chateaubriand - MASP
description: Elevated over a concrete platform used for concerts and a weekly crafts fair, the Museu de Arte de São Paulo (São Paulo Art Museum, abbreviated MASP) is itself a work of art; the building is an imposing Modernist box suspended under two bright red concrete supports. Featuring classical European names such as Gauguin, Goya and Gainsborough, the museum also holds one of the largest collections of Brazilian and other Latin American artists on the continent.

name: Parque Barigui
description: Urban park with sports courts & lakeside trails for hiking/biking, plus a skating rink & BBQ grills.

name: El Retiro Park
description: Expansive, 19th-century park with boating lake & rose garden, plus numerous fountains & statues.

name: Barrio Lastarria
description: This bohemian neighborhood has plenty of shops, bookshops, design shops, museums, cinemas, theater, restaurants and bars, hotels and tourist appartments, and more

name: Forbidden City-The Palace Museum
description: Consisting of more than 9,000 rooms and spread over 250 acres, this huge palace complex was built in the 15th century and later extensively renovated and restored during the Qing Dynasty in the 18th century

name: Nishiki Market Shopping District
description: With a 400-year-old history, Nishiki Market is a downtown covered pedestrian arcade lined with 135 open-fronted shops selling seafood, produce, souvenirs, crafts, and Japanese snacks.

name: The Grand Palace
description: Established in 1782, this ceremonial residence of the Kings of Thailand features several magnificent buildings like the Temple of the Emerald Buddha. Take your time to explore the imposing courtyards and visit the major landmarks within the Grand Palace complex.

name: La Boca
description: Known as the birthplace of the tango, this one-time shipyard has a famous walkway, the Caminito, where tango dancers perform and artists exhibit their work.

name: Museu Oscar Niemeyer
description: A futuristic art museum in Curitiba, known for its striking architecture and contemporary exhibits. Offers vegetarian-friendly café options.

name: Café Cultura
description: A quiet café in São Paulo with high-speed Wi-Fi, perfect for remote work. Serves organic coffee and vegan pastries.

name: Parque Ibirapuera
description: A large urban park in São Paulo with museums, a planetarium, and cultural institutions. Great for jogging and picnics.

name: Museu de Arte Moderna do Rio de Janeiro
description: A modern art museum in Rio de Janeiro with a diverse collection of Brazilian and international art. Features a café with vegan options.

name: Parque Nacional da Tijuca
description: One of the largest urban rainforests in the world, offering hiking trails, waterfalls, and stunning views of Rio de Janeiro.
